issue.title: First party tracking script + tracking subdomains
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Many websites are using common first party tracking script.

### Proposed solution

Some examples..

At `clearstem.com`,
lftce.clearstem.com/load

fromourplace.com
oorto.fromourplace.com/load

philosophy.com
qphil.philosophy.com/providers/atLabel/load

lapolicegear.com
hbpvm.lapolicegear.com/providers/atLabel/load

I suggest adding these rules. Not all the scripts start with `/providers/`, so I added a second general rule. It should block all these here without needing to add any other domains.

`/providers/atLabel/load`
`/init?*fallbackUserId=*^pageUrl=`
`||customers.edgetag.io^` CNAME, should be found in first two
`||fallback.attntags.com^` CNAME, fallback if blocked

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/26c46cb4-10ce-4524-8745-81d43cc30feb)

</details>

I've also collected a list of domains(90) for sake of DNS filtering. Some websites have two. All are first party.

<details><summary>Subdomains</summary>


issue.title: coupangplay.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.20

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.coupangplay.com/play/944b35ce-bb54-4714-a0f5-e4e6ff0df1b4/episode

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshot
`adpacker.net`

If you play the video on the free Coupang Play, an advertisement will be sent out. The above domain must be blocked to block the advertisement.

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition
